mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, replyText, replyer) values (#{rno}, #{bno}, #{replyText}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_reply where bno= #{bno} order by rno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set replyText = #{replyText}, updateDate=sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno}
